featured.text: Why did people in India start wearing a red dot on their forehead?
The position of the bindi is standard: center of the forehead, close to the eyebrows.

definition.zh_def: 額頭，位於眼睛上方的面部區域。
definition.en_def: The part of the face above the eyebrows and below the hairline.
definition.example: She wiped the sweat from her forehead after the long run.
